ModuleDescription: This module is a continuation of Spanish 1. Spanish 2 pays close attention to aural/oral practice while strengthening basic grammar skills, writing, and reading comprehension. Students will continue to learn about the Hispanic world via readings and a variety of audiovisual materials. The module covers the second half of the textbook used in Spanish 1.
Prerequisite: LAS1201 Spanish 1 or YLS1201 Introductory Spanish I, or placement test
